contents.text: Thank you for calling Deepnote in San Francisco, the easiest way to publish your Jupyter notebooks.
For new business inquiries and to schedule a product demo, press 1.
To speak with a sales specialist, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a product demo to evaluate Deepnote for my team.
Schedule a Deepnote product demo so I can learn to showcase my data analysis skills for my civilian career transition.
I need to schedule a product demo focused on Deepnote’s API integration and real-time Jupyter collaboration features.
I’d like to schedule a product demo to see how Deepnote works for me.
I want to schedule a Deepnote demo to evaluate its features for my physics coursework collaborations.

contents.text: To learn about pricing and subscription plans, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: I want detailed pricing and subscription options to finalize our budget.
Ask about Deepnote subscription tiers and whether I qualify for a veteran discount.
I want to understand Deepnote’s subscription tiers, usage-based billing and enterprise seat licensing costs.
I need to learn about your subscription plans and pricing.
I'm looking for information on Deepnote’s subscription plans and academic discounts for students.

contents.text: For technical support or account assistance, press 2.
For help with your Jupyter notebooks or publishing workflow, press 1.
Please hold the line while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting an error in my Jupyter notebook publishing workflow.
Troubleshoot my Jupyter notebook publishing error when linking to external datasets.
I need help troubleshooting my notebook publishing pipeline—kernel errors and container deployment in Deepnote.
I’m having trouble publishing my Jupyter notebook and need help with the workflow.
I need technical help debugging a publishing error in my Jupyter notebook on Deepnote.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold the line while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to review my billing statement and update my payment method.
Obtain my latest billing invoice and update my credit card on file.
I need to update my billing method, retrieve past invoices and adjust seat counts on my Deepnote account.
I want to review my billing and update my payment information.
I have a question about a recent charge on my Deepnote billing statement.
